thought: The workflow seems logically correct and the Gmail send action uses dynamic input data. However, the workflow still has issues preventing execution. The error message indicates the workflow has issues but the exact cause is unclear. I will add validation and logging in the workflow to check the data format before sending emails. Also, I will simplify the email sending step by sending one email at a time in a loop to isolate any problematic item. This will help identify if a specific email causes failure and improve error handling.
plan: Add validation to check gmail_input data format before sending.
Send emails one by one in a loop with try-except to catch errors per email.
Log success or failure for each email send attempt.
Return a summary of email sending results.
Test workflow and analyze logs to fix issues.
criticism: Currently, the workflow sends all emails in one batch which may cause failure if any item is problematic. Sending emails individually with error handling will improve robustness and help identify issues.
